name: TICK-BORNE ENCEPHALITIS VACCINE, INACTIVATED
doses:
Initial immunisation, by intramuscular injection in deltoid region or anterolateral thigh in infants, adult and child over
16 years, 3 doses each of 0.5 mL, second dose after 1–3 months and
third dose after further 5–12 months; child 1–16 years 3 doses of 0.25 mL, second dose after 1–3 months and
third dose after further 5–12 months; elderly over 60 years and immunocompromised (including those receiving immunosuppressants),
antibody concentration may be measured 4 weeks after second dose and
dose repeated if protective levels not achieved

To achieve more rapid protection, second
dose may be given 14 days after first dose

Booster doses, give first dose within 3 years after initial
course completed, then every 3–5 years
